Know About Networks Come Work In Europe

31 May 1999

European economies could be hit hard by an acute shortage of network professionals, according to research by the International Data Corporation to be found on the BBC's site.

An IDC report, The Internet Economy - An Employment Paradox?, predicts Western Europe will experience a shortfall of nearly 600,000 network experts by 2002.
